properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08.
1. DERELICT VESSEL, WHITE AND RED HULL, CAPSIZED
   AND ADRIFT IN VICINITY 42-56.00N 015-04.00W AT
   271200Z NOV. REPORTS TO NAVAREA II,
   COORD.NAVAREA2@SHOM.FR,
   BRIEUC@ADDICTIVE-SAILING.COM.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3057/22.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 010828Z DEC 22.
